D i s t r i b u t i o n: Europe, including European part of Russia , Caucasus, West and East Siberia.

B i o n o m i c s: This species has been collected in Daedaleopsis confragosa (BOLTON) J. SCHRÖT. Fomes fomentarius (L.) J. KICKX f., Fomitopsis pinicola (SW.) P. KARST., Trametes trogii BERK., Lentinus cyathiformis (SCHAEFF.) BRES., Neolentinus lepideus (FR.) REDHEAD & GINNS, and Trametes gibbosa (PERS.) FR.
C o m m e n t: Antenna as in Fig. 5 . Aedeagus as in Fig. 6 . Tergite VIII as in Fig. 7 . New record for the Chita Area.
